title: The Whiffler
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This restaurant is part of the JD Wetherspoon chain and is now offering vegan options (much is organic) on main menu, including sweet potato and vegan flatbread with roasted vegetables, hummus and chips. Not available in other Norwich Wetherspoon pubs (the Glasshouse and Bell). Vegans are easily and respectfully catered for. This pub has a family friendly dining section. There are leaflets available that provide full nutritional values and contents of all meals. Free Wi-Fi.
